dt: {bc}situated at the farthest or most distant point {bc}{sx|extreme||}
{bc}of the greatest or highest degree, quantity, number, or amount

et: Middle English, alteration of {it}utmest{/it}, from Old English {it}ūtmest{/it}, superlative adjective, from {it}ūt{/it} out, adverb {ma}{mat|out:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: situated at the farthest or most distant point : extreme
of the greatest or highest degree, quantity, number, or amount

dt: {bc}the most possible {bc}the extreme limit {bc}the highest attainable point or degree
{bc}the highest, greatest, or best of one's abilities, powers, and resources

shortdef: the most possible : the extreme limit : the highest attainable point or degree
the highest, greatest, or best of one's abilities, powers, and resources
